alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Glynn; Pierce; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 11:16PM EDT until June 18 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Camden County in southeastern Georgia... Central Glynn County in southeastern Georgia... South central Pierce County in southeastern Georgia... Brantley County in southeastern Georgia... East central Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Northeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1116 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jamestown to near Nahunta to near Thalmann, moving southeast at 30 mph. These storms have a history of producing damage. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Waycross, St. Simons Island, Nahunta, Dock Junction, Hickox, Country Club Estates, Boggy Bay, Thalmann and Sea Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Glynn; Pierce; Ware
